Description:
SGP- Riyadh is looking for a receptionist to be responsible for greeting clients and visitors to our office.To great all the visitors with a positive and friendly attitude.
To give the direction to all the company visitors regarding the various office parts.
To contact employees regarding the visitors.
Answering phone calls and taking notes and massages.Skills
Skills:
To speak and write English Fluently.
High school or Diploma degree holder.
Can join immediately.
